paths in a quiver

 boolean add(QArrow arrow)

          locates the midpoint of the curve representing the path.
 double distanceToCurve(Point pt)
          point to curve distance this doesn't really measure distance..it just gives a sort of yes/no answer as to whether the point pt is close enough (within snap tolerance) to the curve representing the path todo: this doesn't work very well...seems to 'intersect' even when the cursor is pretty far away

distanceToCurve

public double distanceToCurve(Point pt)
point to curve distance this doesn't really measure distance..it just gives a sort of yes/no answer as to whether the point pt is close enough (within snap tolerance) to the curve representing the path todo: this doesn't work very well...seems to 'intersect' even when the cursor is pretty far away
Parameters:
pt - a coordinate
Returns:
the distance
